column2: "I've caused a lot of trouble for you all..."
"Did you hit something when you collapsed, or..."
"You should've just left me to my fate..."
"...The world is better off without me around."
"...Manon. Did you use your Overboost on purpose?"
"It was the only way I could atone for all the people I hurt."
"...to all of the people I hurt..."
"If I just disappeared from the world..."
"Why would you say something so ridiculous?!"
"Nobody thinks poorly of you at all, Manon!"
"We were able to fight BECAUSE you were there!"

"So many people get along with each other now...
because you were there, Manon."
"We've been constantly telling this to you..."
"You guys are the only ones who say that to me."

"Everyone else, though? Deep down,
they only see me as an enemy..."
"Everyone has been worried sick about you, Manon!"

"That's precisely why everyone worked
together to gather all those Liminal Signs!"

"Proof of the positive impact
you've had all around Halpha."

"Look at all of the people who've gathered
here because they're worried about you."

"I carried out experiments on Halpha and its people
to recapture ARKS' former strength..."

"Wouldn't I be betraying you all
if I didn't use my power...?"
"There'll be no need for a power like that if we're all together."
"Betrayal would be sacrificing your life like that."

"I'm terrified of dying alone thinking about
all those people who look at me with disgust!"
"So what if some people don't think highly of you?"
"That will change with time. Little by little."
"We'll be there with you every step of the way. Kay?"
"Let everyone else know how you feel, Manon."
"ガヤ：マノンを心配するアークスたち①"
"Everyone... Thank you so much for all of your help..."
"For the longest time, I never thought I deserved to be forgiven..."
"But... But... If there's a chance that you all might forgive me..."

"So please...
Let me stay here with you all!"
"ガヤ：マノンを心配するアークスたち②"
"ガヤ：マノンを心配するアークスたち②"
